cause.description:
TERRANCE: "You're such a pig f*cker, Phillip!" PHILLIP: "Terrance, why would you call me a pig f*cker?" TERRANCE: "Well, let's see. First of all, you f*ck pigs!" PHILLIP: "Oh yeah!" BOTH: [laughing hysterically] "South Park; Bigger, Longer and Uncut"
http://youtube.com/watch?v=rM-UDPnPyGQ
this doesnt mean stop people from f*cking pigs...thats fine. this means stop pigs from f*cking eachother.
1. Pig f*cking must end now!
cause.name: Stop Pig F*cking Now
